title: darklord420

content: Hello, i am selling my BC gaming account.for screen shot or image of accountmessage me.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: The reason bc.games account should not be bought:https://bc.game/help/terms-serviceQuote4.1.4. All information that You provide to BC.GAME during the term of validity of this agreement is true, complete, and correct, and that You shall immediately notify BC.GAME of any change of such information.5. Prohibited Uses5.1. PERSONAL USE. The Service is intended solely for the User’s personal use. The User is only allowed to wager for his/her personal entertainment and may not create multiple accounts, including for the purpose of collusion and/or abuse of service.6. Know your Customer (“KYC”)BC.GAME reserves the right, at any time, to ask for any KYC documentation it deems necessary to determine the identity and location of a User. BC.GAME reserves the right to restrict service and payment until identity is sufficiently determined.Buyer may only later just lose the account.
